name: Madshus Nordic Cross-country Ski Boots - Unisex
description: Comfortable and stable boots for those working towards nordic goals or recreational skiiers testing out the sport. The ankle-height cuff keeps out snow, and forefoot flex balances support and control for hours in the track.Durable PVC uppers.Breathable MemBrain® soft shell lace cover with lacing finger system.PU heel counter provides solid rearfoot hold.
